content: skill level intermediate size the cover should be 13cm wide and 18cm long materials 50g of any dk weight yarn for the sample i used sirdar simply recycled dk yarn shade grape http //www deramores com/sirdar-simply-recycled-dk/ hooks and notions crochet hook 3 5mm e or size needed to obtain the gauge tapestry needle stitches used st s stitch es chain chain stitch single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch
